Traits.Name: Mob
Traits.Description: This character doesnâ€™t trigger slay effects.

Actions.Name: Torch and Pitchfork
Actions.Description: Deal 1 damage as an effect. If an ally is adjacent to the target, make an attack, dealing damage on hit.

Interrupts.Name: Self-Sacrifice
Interrupts.Description: When a Siren in range 3 is hit by an attack, the Enthralled dashes to be adjacent to that Siren and takes the hit for them.
